goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.description: Goblins are small, black-hearted humanoids that lair in despoiled dungeons and other dismal settings. Individually weak, they gather in large numbers to torment other creatures.

actions.name: Nimble Escape
actions.description: The goblin can take the disengage or Hide actionas a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
